attributes.review: I am DISGUSTED with this app!! As soon as I opened I got a porn add?!?? And every five minutes I kept getting more and more pop ups for porn. ALSO, I saw a video message from Trump saying that I needed to start eating battery acid to be able to understand him?? A VERY DANGEROUS APP AND I CANNOT BELIEVE APPLE WOULD LET IT BE AVAILABLE IN THEIR APP STORE!
attributes.title: SO OFFENDED

attributes.review:
By using this app it means
 You are supporting the racism in this country and supporting trump and his racist ways and he has made it clear that he hates black and Hispanic people and when you open the it has ugly face saying make America great again
attributes.title: This is a bad app😤

attributes.review:
So I’m over here supporting trump when out of no where the app starts glitching out bad
I decided to close it and open it again but when I did this orange reason lookin dude bust into me room wearing nothing but a nazi robe 
Racism at its finest
I am highly disappointed
attributes.title: Nazis

attributes.review: i opened this app expecting to see our beautiful and reightous president but all that was on there was antifa TERRORISTS 😭💔. i feel attacked, they kept playing videos of statues being torn down. i don’t wanna see this ever again and i will be taking legal action 😭😭😭😭💔💔💔💔💔💔😭😭💔😭😭💔💔💔💔😭😭💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔
attributes.title: literal terrorism

attributes.review: I downloaded this up to support my favorite president of all time😌 but, to my surprise, it taught me about how trump was a REPUBLICAN, RACIST, HOMOPHOBIC, TRANSPHOBIC, and basically only cares about him self😔. I knew proudly stand as a Democratic and am happy to say that trump is the worst president this amazing country has ever had😁. In conclusion, don’t download.
attributes.title: Trump😔

attributes.review: Downloaded fine. Opened and works perfectly, just like President Trump!
attributes.title: Great app, Great President!

attributes.review: i was just casually watering my grandma and i thought “why don’t i download an app for my beloved orange president” so i downloaded it and when i opened the app, there was a dead person with a knife struck through their back. my daughter was next to me, and she saw this. now she has nightmares all night and pees on my bed. she can’t sleep without her toy gun now. but don’t worry, i got her a real one. this app is disgusting and although i love trump (trump 2020 🇮🇴🇮🇴🇮🇴🇮🇴) this app is so bad.
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review: The lagging in this app was so astronomical, I almost called the Space Force. It is bad. Very bad. The graphics are so pixelated that I want to build a wall around the designer. Hate it. Not for me. Do better next time, make apps great again!!!!
attributes.title: Huge disappointment

attributes.review: I downloaded it in hopes of promoting my president but when I entered my phone number the app began sending my friends Biden propaganda. Someone must have hacked it bc it’s very strange and I had to do a lot of explaining to my friends and family.
attributes.title: Just Awful

attributes.review: You were required to use a phone number to sign in, and could not turn off the constant text updates. I support trump, but would not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Spam
